website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic purchase for those wanting a jumbo-size tube to protect larger documents.
pros: Expands up to 53 inches in length and features an extra-wide diameter of 5.5 inches
Includes both a carrying handle and an adjustable shoulder strap
Resistant to both light and water
cons: Many customers have trouble keeping the adjusted length in place

customer_reviews.title: Finally a reusable travel tube
customer_reviews.text: Handled the rigors of international airline travel. I didn't check it but it was just fine as a carry on. All of the items I had inside made it without a crease or other damage. The strap was sufficient and the handle worked reasonably well... wish it would move a bit further to balance the tube and lock in place... minor issues. The larger diameter means items retained less curl and I was able to store other mounting materials in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: You're better of buying some PVC and making your own. It's sturdy enough, except when fully extended. The plastic is stiffer than some other commercial tubes, but not rigid. The strap is not designed well and cumbersome to use except at certain heights. It was dropped once from of about three feet while empty. lt landed on its top and shattered the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MALFUNCTIONS - poor design.
customer_reviews.text: The tube extension mechanism does not lock - the length that you set it at doesn't stay put - it collapses and crushes the end of the paper roll inside. The handle slides onto a dovetailed interlock - and slides right off - have your tube go rolling down an airport escalator while you are left with the handle - the strap detail is poorly designed and can't be adjusted properly. I have owned many paper roll Tubes - there are some crummy ones out there - but this wins the position of the worst. For a blow-molded piece of plastic, it is also priced too high even if it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Banny

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This storage tube is junk. Length adjustment doesn't work because there's no way to lock it down on the size you want. I had to use tape to keep it at the size I wanted. Look elsewhere. This storage tube sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel from Miami

customer_reviews.title: Solid adjustable tube for storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store/transport part of my display case when I travel to trade shows. It works well for this application. My only beef is the locking mechanism (a twist/cam) does not lock the tube length very strongly and the tube can come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Swauger

customer_reviews.title: it collapses from the size you set it to far too easily, and has essentially no locking mechanism to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: It is plenty large enough, and very durable. The adjustable feature makes it quite versatile. However, it collapses from the size you set it to far too easily, and has essentially no locking mechanism to hold the poster tube at the size you set it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Lane

customer_reviews.title: A Wee Bit More Thought
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick plastic but strap and handle construction was very well thought out. The rivet that attaches the strap to the cap popped out on first day. Trying to carry with the handle was no better. Why make a sliding groove with no stops to keep it from coming off?🤯🤯🤯
customer_reviews.author: Back To Reality

customer_reviews.title: So So if you need the largest size.
customer_reviews.text: I use it at its largest size. Unfortunately, the two tubes came apart and bent my papers that I had stored in it. Also, the handle fell off while I was carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just didn’t fit golf clubs.
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased to ship golf clubs, but it wasn’t big enough diameter.
customer_reviews.author: drschafer54

customer_reviews.title: This tube is great, with good quality threading on the ends
customer_reviews.text: This tube is great, with good quality threading on the ends. It's plenty large enough for my needs (storing and carrying posters mostly) that I won't have to extend it, but the extension mechanism seems well made and easy to use if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but works great for two or three large neoprene maps storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat Nozlen cases.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a large roll of blueprints...or anything else that will fit in it!
customer_reviews.author: Dobie

customer_reviews.title: ... lock when extended is "ok" but it would be nice if it was more secure
customer_reviews.text: The lock when extended is "ok" but it would be nice if it was more secure, twist lock is convenient but I'd trade more secure for less convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry M Edtl

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: My first one broke after only 3 uses. i contacted customer service and they were great, sending me out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Storage tube and in a great size
customer_reviews.text: Nice little Storage tube and in a great size! I use it to store 5 fishing rods and it works great and stores neatly and out of the way. I just toss it in the trunk and away we go to the lake. Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.author: calcantar

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: This item broke during its first use, and unfortunately in an airport, leaving me to have to tape it together for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

product_meta.title: Nozlen Jumbo Document Storage Tube Black - Expandable from 31.5" up to 53" - Shoulder Strap and Handle Included for Poster Tube Model DT4201
product_meta.description: Model DT4201 is Nozlen's largest document storage tube. The tube is expandable up to 53" in length. The outside diameter of the tube is 5.5". The tube is made from a heavy weight plastic that will withstand a beating! This Jumbo Document Storage Tube is great for large posters, maps, blueprints, artwork, fishing poles, camera equipment, or just about anything else you can imagine! This Nozlen product comes with a Lifetime Product Warranty. It's also backed by Nozlen's customer service. Don't be fooled by imitations, if it's not Nozlen, you will get exactly what you pay for, and the service usually stops at the time of the sale!
feature_bullets: Expands from 31.5" to 53" with an outside diameter of 5.5"
Extra Long Shoulder Strap and Adjustable Handle included
Water and Light Resistant poster storage tube
Made of Black Rigid Plastic to protect contents inside.
This is a Nozlen Product, backed by our Great Customer Service and Lifetime Product Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
